author: Techlore
description:
One user shares they configured Signal's disappearing messages and replicated their old Snapchat workflow with far better security! Welcome to Techlore's privacy wins of the week, where our community shares their tech wins. It can be privacy, security, or anything else tech-related! Join next week's stream in the pinned post on our forum: https://discuss.techlore.tech/
